name: Wydroion
description:
Wydroion is a fast-paced action game made for the GMTK game jam!
Note: This game works best with Firefox or Chrome (there seem to be some issues with scrolling up when jumping). Try to close some tabs if it runs slowly.

Feel free to post your score!

How to play?
    When you move fast, you are able to kill enemies. When you kill many of them in a row without touching the ground, you can get a combo. When you get a combo of 3 or more (more is better) and you touch the ground you will gain health. After killing an enemy you
    • get a speed boost and
    • you can jump again in mid-air
    • score a point
Controls
  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Left Arrow / Right Arrow - Move
  • Any key - Start
Tools

A list of tools I used to make this game:

  • Atom (Text editor)
  • GIMP
  • Bfxr
  • Audacity
  • LMMS
Libraries
  • My game engine
